Lyric:
[00:04.920]Yeah let me tell you
[00:06.940]about this one girl i know.
[00:10.350]She's a bad girl.
[00:11.790](Bad girl)
[00:12.860]She breaks my heart and
[00:14.370]Play my heart.
[00:20.420]어젯밤 네 어깨너머로
[00:22.950]나 흘깃 훔쳐봤어
[00:26.440]울리는 전화벨소리
[00:29.010]받지않는너
[00:30.900]난 알고있어
[00:35.610]까만 밤이 지나면
[00:37.860]다시 그에게로
[00:39.980]넌 돌아가겠지
[00:43.550]아침이 밝아오기전에

[01:07.100]난 숨죽여

[01:23.350]You are so bad girl
[01:25.990]Oh bad girl

[01:30.940](So addicted to you)
[01:32.000]Cause you're so bad girl
[01:33.690]Bad bad girl
